movies.title: Interstellar
movies.summary: With humanity teetering on the brink of extinction, a group of astronauts travels through a wormhole in search of another inhabitable planet.

movies.title: Life of Pi
movies.summary: A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.

movies.title: Passengers
movies.summary: A spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet and transporting thousands of people has a malfunction in its sleep chambers. As a result, two passengers are awakened 90 years early.

movies.title: I Want to Eat Your Pancreas
movies.summary: A high school student discovers one of his classmates, Sakura Yamauchi, is suffering from a terminal illness. This secret brings the two together, as she lives out her final moments.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.summary: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.summary: Convicted of murdering his wife and her lover, a quiet banker tries to survive prison by clinging to hope â€” and befriending a fellow lifer named Red.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.summary: depicts a dystopian future in which humanity is unknowingly trapped inside the Matrix, a simulated reality created by intelligent machines. Believing computer hacker Neo to be 'the One' prophesied to defeat them, Morpheus recruits him into a rebellion against the machines.

movies.title: Moonfall
movies.summary: The world stands on the brink of annihilation when a mysterious force knocks the moon from its orbit and sends it hurtling toward a collision course with Earth. With only weeks before impact, NASA executive Jocinda 'Jo' Fowler teams up with a man from her past and a conspiracy theorist for an impossible mission into space to save humanity.

movies.title: Prometheus
movies.summary: A team of scientists and explorers travel to a distant moon (LV-223) after discovering ancient star maps pointing to its location. They seek the Engineers, an advanced alien race believed to have created humanity.However, upon arrival, they find a deadly bio-weapon (black goo) left behind by the Engineers, which starts infecting them, leading to horrifying mutations and chaos.

movies.title: Harry Potter
movies.summary: A young boy discovers he is a wizard and attends Hogwarts School, where he makes new friends and faces the dark legacy of Lord Voldemort.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.summary: A young aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic. Their love story unfolds as disaster strikes the ship.

movies.title: The Garden of Words
movies.summary: A high school student aspiring to be a shoemaker forms an unexpected bond with an older woman he meets in a rainy garden.

movies.title: Grave of the Fireflies
movies.summary: A heartbreaking story of two orphaned siblings struggling to survive in post-World War II Japan.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.summary: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son, leading to power struggles and betrayals.

movies.title: Inception
movies.summary: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets is given a seemingly impossible task: to implant an idea into someone's mind. As he navigates the dream world, reality and illusion blur.

reviews: Amazing movie with great visuals and a compelling story.
A must-watch movie for all sci-fi fans.
A beautiful story of survival and friendship.
A heartwarming tale of love and loss.
A gripping crime thriller with a powerful message.
A classic movie that stands the test of time.
